definition: to change, or to change something, to suit different conditions or uses
a sudden or complete change, especially of one person or thing for another
to change something such as a plan, opinion, law, or way of behaviour slightly, usually to improve it or make it more acceptable
to change something slightly, especially in order to make it more correct, effective, or suitable
If a process or achievement that was slow and complicated unravels or is unravelled, it is destroyed
